column2: "How do you do, Master? Have you had a chance to try Etoile yet?"
"Etoile provides hospitality to those around it as it fights, giving strength to all its allies. It would please me greatly if you were to utilize it."
"With that in mind, Master, I have a request for you."
"In order to further develop Etoile, I would like to gather data regarding how it combats a variety of enemies."
"If you do not mind, I would so appreciate your help with this, Master!"
